string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Insert the word that complete the first word and begins the second. Ur(..)Al
Find the odd man out. Nisob Nethelope azbre Giret
If you rearrange the letters "AIRBTB," you would have the name of a:
Maryam, twelve years old, is three times as old as her sister. How old will Maryam be when she is twice as old as her sister?
Two people can make two bicycles in 2 hours. How many people are required to make 12 bicycles in 6 hours?
How many birthdays does the average man have?
If a plane crashes on the border between the United States and Canada, where do they bury the survivors?
Which number can replace both question marks? 2/? = ?/50.
The zoo had some lions and some parrots. The supervisor counted 15 heads and 50 legs. How Many Lions are there?
